content: in a court case in messina a decision was made regarding compensation after a 2year and 6month duration the judge assigned all the properties including a flat in messina a piece of land in messina and a flat in villafranca tirrena to mm additionally mm was ordered to pay a sum of money to ac the case involved the dissolution of a joint inheritance of three properties with mm as the main plaintiff and cd as the defendant the inheritance also involved mms brother aunt and cousins there was a dispute over the division of assets and payment of expenses which led to mediation attempts that failed and resulted in the court case a courtappointed expert provided a report on the value of the properties and based on this the judge determined that the assets could be divided and assigned them accordingly the judge also ruled on the payment of costs and expenses the final decision was made on april 11 2022 in messina

metadata.CASE_ID: Court of Messina sec. I, 07/11/2022 no. 1852
metadata.cost: 12,634.30 EUR plus 14,634.30 EUR plus 14,634.00 EUR plus 14,439.20 EUR as compensation to the parties
